__e: Sorry, but I don't plan on getting any further involved in this.
All right, look... I don't want to get involved here, but... I will tell you she was quite taken with you.
I don't know. I asked her the exact same thing, because I don't wanna be in the middle of any of this.
- But should I believe the girl who dragged me into that situation?
There is no way that you can tell me that you did not know the guy who got you into this.
I'm the one who got him involved in all this.
I am so sorry I brought you into this, Robert, after all these years.
Listen' all of you I'm sorry I got you into this.
I'm sorry that I put you through all this But I promised you that I would take care of it, and I am.
Are you not afraid to be a part of it? After what happened with your brother?
When it was you to decided to get involved, did you give me a thought?
Getting mixed up in other people's lives and helping them out of jams, seems to be what you do.
